column2: Declare yourself the sole King of England
With you fully in control of the English lands, you can abolish the Witan and end the Anglo-Saxon hegemony over Anglia once and for all!
Declare yourself the sole King of England
With you fully in control of the English lands, you can abolish the Witan and end the Anglo-Saxon hegemony over Anglia once and for all!
The old Anglo-Saxon kingdom of England will now be forfeit…but do not despair! From its ashes a much more powerful and glorious realm will arise!
